title: 4 bedroom 2 bath townhouse Oakmont
description:
AVAILABLE January 1, 2023!! $1,299 per month.  Section 8- 4 bedroom vouchers ONLY, no JP Court landlord/tenant complaints, and no evictions!  A spacious 1250 Sq ft 4-bedroom townhouse for lease in New Castle, DE, within the development of Oakmont.
Description
The house has four bedrooms (1 bedroom on the lower-level & 3 bedrooms on the top level), two full baths, and spacious living & dining rooms.  The kitchen is small; however, it has lots of closet/storage space.  You will find hardwood flooring on the main and upper bedroom levels, but vinyl flooring is on the lower level. There is a large family room, laundry room with a washer & dryer, small patio, fenced-in yard, and one-car driveway.
Tenant expenses
You should know I am advertising the property for $1,299 per month; however, the lease agreement is for $1,499 per month, which means you will be entitled to a $200.00 discount when the rent is paid on or before the 1st of each month by 4 p.m beginning with your second rental month.  Any payments made after 4 p.m. on the 1st are considered late. What that means is any payment made after 4 p.m. on the 1st or the 2nd, 3rd, or the 4th, you will lose the $200.00 discount, and you must pay the full rental payment of $1,499.00.
Additionally, the tenant is responsible for all utilities, including electricity & gas, water, landscaping, snow, and trash removal.
Income, credit history, and reference letter requirements
The income requirement is
$4200+ per month for 1 to 2 people
$4700+ per month for three people
$5200+ per month for four people
$5700+ per month for five people. It goes up by $500 for each additional person.
Background and credit inquiries are required; however, you do not have to have a perfect background and credit history because everyone makes mistakes from time to time.  However, I do require you have a great rental payment record with no landlord/tenant payment disputes filed with JPCourt. If you are unaware of a past JP Court complaint, check out their website to see if any complaints were filed against you.
Applicants will need a reference letter from their landlord, but that won’t count if your landlord is a family member. You will need a letter of recommendation from your last landlord and a character reference from a colleague. I will need a contact telephone number and address for your reference. If approved for a one-year lease you will need to pay your 1st months rent and security deposit totalling $2,998.00 when you sign the lease.
If you don't meet the income requirements and have a credit score below 650, an exception can be made case-by-case.  In that situation, I can only offer a month-to-month lease. With a month-to-month lease, you must pay one month in security, 1st month’s rent, and the last month’s rent totals $4,497.00.

title: UNIQUE GORGEOUS 1BD 1BA APARTMENT
description:
This is a unique second-floor apartment in the South of South neighborhood (16th and Carpenter) that is full of beautiful finishes and character. Provides quick, convenient access to University City, Center City, South Philly, Broad-Street Line subway, numerous bus-stops, and I-76. This 2-bedroom converted to 1-bedroom apartment offers a modern and spacious kitchen, huge bathroom with walk-in shower, bedroom with custom built-in closet system, and roof-deck access off of the kitchen. Quality custom finishes include random-width Pennsylvania-sourced hardwood floors, large custom floor-to-ceiling solid mahogany doors, textured slate wall in kitchen and bathroom, and tongue and groove pine ceilings throughout. Open-layout kitchen boasts modern stainless steel appliances, gas stove/oven, granite countertops, peninsula/breakfast bar with custom decorative support, beautiful dark wood cabinets, and travertine backsplash. Spacious bathroom with large walk-in shower is complete with 6 different shower heads. Bedroom has ceiling fan and custom built-in dresser/closet system with large, deep drawers and plenty of hanging space. Private roof deck offers quiet, peaceful outdoor space with view of city skyline. Apartment comes with all appliances including refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, gas stove/oven, washer, and dryer. Forced air heat and central A/C. Rent includes electric, gas, water, sewer, internet, and trash. Dog-friendly apartment (no cats); family-friendly neighborhood. Short walk to restaurants, bars, and coffee shops; two blocks from YMCA gym or few blocks to City Fitness Gym on South Street; Indego (Philly Bike Share Program) stations within a few blocks, new high-end Sprouts grocery store and Target two blocks away. Quick commute to University of Penn/Hospital of Univ of Penn/Pennsylvania Hospital, Children's Hospital, Jefferson University/Hospital, Drexel University.
Apartment available December 2022.  No smoking allowed.
Pet friendly.
